file_finder.description: Instantly locate any system file using smart keyword search — no path memory needed.

read_file.description: View any file’s full contents instantly, cleanly formatted for direct use or review.

json_manager.description: Easily edit structured data — add, update, or delete entries without breaking format.

system_settings.description: Control core system behavior — manage tool registry, unlock logic, and execution routing.

terminal.description: Run safe shell commands from inside GPT — test, debug, or inspect the environment live.

mash_tool.description: Play a nostalgic logic game that generates randomized future outcomes for fun or storytelling.

buffer_engine.description: Draft, schedule, and auto-publish content to social channels — no manual posting needed.

article_builder_tool.description: Turn structured outlines into fully formatted, image-injected blog articles.

outline_editor.description: Build, manage, and publish clean content documents with deep structure and backlinks.

mem_tool.description: Send notes, ideas, or transcripts directly into Mem — perfect for cross-app capture.

github_tool_universal.description: Push updates, clone repos, or commit changes — all through GPT-managed automation.

ideogram_tool.description: Generate beautiful AI-driven visuals from simple prompts — great for headers or assets.

code_editor.description: Create, patch, or inject code into live tools — works with blueprints or raw scripts.
